DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multiple-Site, Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of DSXS topical product in Patients with Mild to Severe Scalp Psoriasis
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Clinical Study in Patients With Mild to Severe Scalp Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate the therapeutic efficacy and safety of DSXS topical product (Taro Pharmaceuticals, U.S.A., Inc.) compared to a Vehicle topical product (Taro Pharmaceuticals, U.S.A., Inc.) in patients with mild to severe scalp psoriasis.
DOC.criteria: Male or nonpregnant, nonlactating females 18 years of age and older. Females who are pregnant, lactating or likely to become pregnant during the study.
